channel.title: How do i add more bones to alch on a altar?

item.title: How do i add more bones to alch on a altar?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“tlol, post:5, topic:521240”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=639752.msg4311977#msg4311977 date=1370888017]
Well…
The snippit of code you gave us/me… Doesn’t help with shit.
[/quote]what do you want me to give you so you can check it out if u really wanna help you can just add me on skype people ignace_de_sutter[/quote]
Look: && object.getDefinitions().name.equals(“Altar”)) {
That’s only part of a statement. We need at least the whole statement…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add more bones to alch on a altar?

item.title: How do i add more bones to alch on a altar?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

i don’t believe you gave us enough of the code, but working with what i have:object.getDefinitions().name.equals("Altar")) { int[][] bones = { {BONE_ID, XP_PER_BONE}, {BONE_ID_2, XP_PER_BONE_2}, {BONE_ID_3, XP_PER_BONE_3} }; for (int i = 0; i < bones.length; i++) { if (player.getInventory().hasItem(bones) {//method name may be different player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You pray at the gods"); player.getInventory().deleteItem(new Item(bones[i][0], 1)); player.getSkills().addXp(Skills.PRAYER, bones[i][1]); player.getPackets().sendSound(2738, 0, 1); player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(896)); player.setNextGraphics(new Graphics(624)); player.getInventory().refresh(); } else player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You have no bones."); } }etc

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add more bones to alch on a altar?
item.dc:creator: @tlol tlol
item.description:
@tlol wrote:

title says is all.

i wanna know how i need to add more bones to my altar this is the current command

&& object.getDefinitions().name.equals(“Altar”)) {
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(
“You pray at the gods”);
player.getInventory().deleteItem(new Item(536, 1));
player.getSkills().addXp(Skills.PRAYER, 650);
player.getPackets().sendSound(2738, 0, 1);
player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(896));
player.setNextGraphics(new Graphics(624));
player.getInventory().refresh();

hope you guys can help me out
thanks

Read full topic
